description: Spiritual in San Diego, CA. Foundation Of Health Chiropractic is your local Chiropractor in San Diego serving all of your needs. Call us today at (619) 295-5030 for an appointment.
cleaned_text: Einstein reputedly divided people in two groups, those who believe we live in a friendly universe, and those who don't.
